page.title: 07Agricultural Camp (cont)
page.content: The work campers do is: May/June - weeding and strawing. Gooseberries and early strawberries. Pre-pack work. June/July - straw- berries, gooseberries and courgettes. July/August - Plums, apples, blackberries, beans, courgettes, potatoes. Pre-pack work. August/ October - apples, pears, blackberries, courgettes, potatoes. Pre-pack work. Up to 500 campers can be housed in open plan huts for males, females and married couples. At the beginning of July there were 214. Some of the facilities they have are; showers, washing rooms, TV rooms, games room, shop, swimming pool, tennis court, volley-ball, green, football pitch, bar and club room open to locals.
